flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This is a project in progress, I will add picture and code when it's done.
guide.introduction_rendered: This is a project in progress, I will add picture and code when it's done.
guide.summary: This is my attempt to make a MIDI drum set using piezo sensors plugged into an Arduino Uno and inexpensive espresso coffee cans (plus a USB/MIDI interface, a computer and the free SuperDrum FX drum VST instrument and the Cantabile lite VST host), based on
guide.title: Luigi Lavazza MIDI Drum Set
